However, moving directly towards the goal is obstructed since moving left is not an option. The moment I make a move, my avatar will either rotate or move based on the action. 

Since I didn’t specify a location for the avatar in the text, let's consider a rightward movement towards an open space. The optimal current action would be to move to the right (2, 47) as the next cell to the right is free of obstacles.

``` Action:2 ```

This action aims to maximize distance from existing camels and position me closer to the goal, aligning with the strategy to maintain movement away from camels and toward the objective. I expect to see my avatar move right and have a clearer path towards the goal on subsequent turns.
